title: check your servers (please!)
body:
there are several posts within the last 24 hours on the boards in the miscellaneous section talking about being disconnected,
only minutes after another person and they state they have seen others disconnect at exactly the same time.

I really would like you to check your server stability because im sure that *no one* wants another TPG to happen (http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=76686)

please consider. i'm not sure if you have solved it already but I just wanted to update you

replies.body: Just for a heads up, we've posted a retrospective on the issues of the last few days here, with information about what happened [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015).
